name: Follower or Betrayer
description:
This version has hardcoded the test account for twitch, if you still want to try it out, you can get ir here: https://cosmicbrew.itch.io/working

A game of two competing factions in which the villagers are not controlled by the main player, but a different twitch viewer each.

Use the chat to command your character to gather resources, grind levels with enemies, or attack other players.

Basically an RTS but every twitch chat user is a unit.

 Accept the streamer's commands, or rebel!
